availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John W Caldwell (Hickman County, Kentucky, student)

body.p: Hickman County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of John F. Caldwell and Isabella C. Harlan Caldwell. Student and farmer in Hickman County in 1850. Farmer in Hickman County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, p. 17B.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, p. 659, p. 3 of 11 of microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
Alpheus H. Harlan, History and Genealogy of the Harlan Family : and particularly of the descendants of George and Michael Harlan, (Baltimore, Maryland: The Lord Baltimore Press, c1914), p. 649, p. 1367 of 2220 of microfilm.
KYR-0001-020-1404.
